_header: When Jesu Christ walk in this world here
_description: Gospel for Friday after Pentecost, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When ihesu crist welk in þis werld hereþan bifell on þis manere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …fferd and awonderd þai wareNow of þis mater es no mare
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Factum est in una dierum.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia vi proxima Secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 97ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.233-242.
